paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Patient P1 developed symptoms of IAPP amyloidosis at age 45.
Patient P2 was diagnosed with IAPP amyloidosis at age 58.

individual_records.phenotype_details: showed early signs of IAPP amyloidosis
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Patient P3 showed early signs of IAPP amyloidosis at age 38.
Patient P4 was diagnosed with IAPP amyloidosis at age 43.

functional_data.summary: TTR L12P variant shows enhanced inhibition of IAPP amyloid formation.

variants.additional_notes: The TTR L12P variant is associated with increased amyloid inhibition.
key_quotes: The results show that several TTR variants display a significantly potentiated effect as compared to TTR-wt.
The ability of TTR to interfere with IAPP amyloid formation displays an inverse correlation to its thermodynamic stability.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data for the TTR gene was extracted successfully.
